original_text: Then there came a voice from above the vault over their heads as they stood with lowered wings.
korean_text: 그 머리 위에 있는 궁창 위에서부터 음성이 나더라 그 생물이 설 때에 그 날개를 내렸더라

sentences.original_text: Then there came a voice from above
from above the vault over their heads
as they stood with lowered wings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 낮게 든 날개로 서 있을 때
